job description:
Job Description
Immediate need in Pittsburgh, PA. No C2C.

Required:
  • 8+ years of overall experience in the field of Software Quality Assurance
  • 4+ years of experience in DWH or ETL testing
  • Solid experience in creation and maintenance of complex queries in relational databases
  • Deep hands-on, as well as Lead/Coordination experience
  • Expertise in different types of testing, including but not limited to Functional, Regression, back end, End To End (E2E), Non-Functional, and UAT
  • Comprehensive knowledge of documentation within Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC)
  • Experience in performing test execution review and Root Cause Analysis (RCA)
  • Thorough understanding of the entire Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
  • Consulting mindset, diplomatic personality, interviewing skills
  • Team player, proactive, positive, and can-do attitude
  • Creative, able to initiate new ideas
Preferred:
  • Conceptual understanding of Intake and Prioritization, Change Management, as well as Release Management
  • In-depth knowledge of Business Requirements creation and maintenance process
  • Technical writing and presentation skills
  • BI testing
  • Familiarity with Mainframe and Web-based platform
  • Utilization of Waterfall and Agile methodologies
PLUS to have:

1) Advanced skills in Excel and Powerpoint
2) Being able to configure Sharepoint

Soft Skills:
  • Must work well with a team. Very rare they will be sitting in their cube all day
  • Must be professional - working with all different types of people every day
  • Must be personable.
  • Can't be stuck in their ways. MUST be open to change.
  • Must have an opinion and don't crumble if it's challenged. Needs to stick up for their opinion and explain why they have it - Don't be weak
  • Must be comfortable meeting new people all the time
